column4: Let's be vague. Give me reasons Ubuntu wont install on a computer that Windows works fine on (If you want to be less vague: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=512208)
I've tried 3 Ubuntu ones, and 1 Kubuntu one
There is a text installer? And why would that be more effective?
Thats what the alternate CD is... and it just plain works better when there are issues.
